# Camera Models[![Build Status](https://github.com/iory/cameramodels/workflows/Run%20Tests/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/iory/cameramodels/actions)

Documentation | Python API |

Manipulate Camera Library.## Installation```bashpip install cameramodels```If you would like to use `open3d` conversion functions,```bashpip install cameramodels[all]```
